input.sentences: exploring an abandoned building today . it is rumored to be haunted .
ca n't even imagine what went on in this place . like | what was that used for ? it looks like a pulley system .
the earth is taking back the building . you can almost hear the sounds of years gone by .
no sign of what this building was and no graffiti . the echos of the past will never leave though .
watch your step ! the floor has given way and left a big drop to the floor below . let 's move to a safer area .
output.sentences: My friends and I were on a mission to go in the rumored to be haunted asylum, and when we saw it we couldn't resist exploring.
When we first walked inside, we saw this very unusual system that had a pulley in the contraption, and we couldn't imagine what that was used for!
As we were taking pictures to prove we have been there, the sounds this place was making were weird to hear
The scariest part was a sign in one of the bedrooms we past, saying the spirits never leave this place.
I had to watch my step as the building was falling apart, and it was definitely safer to be there with a friend!
